dynamic_line: Wha--  What just happened?!  What the hell did you do?!

responses.text: Hold on, I need to think...

dynamic_line: I don't quite get it, but I guess that means I'm a human now, huh.  It kinda sucks that I can't use my old powers though...  But I wonder if that's better than going crazy worrying whether you can find increasingly rare prey just like my brethren.

responses.text: I'm glad we were able to talk like this.  Come.  Let's move on together.
You're still my pet, don't forget that.  Come now, don't keep me waiting... pet.

dynamic_line: Yup, suuure～  It's you who made me like this after all, so you better take the responsibility, my dear mas-ter♪
Yeah, yeah.  Don't blame me if one day you get backstabbed with that attitude.
